# VisualShaderNodeSample3D

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [VisualShaderNodeTexture2DArray](class_visualshadernodetexture2darray.md), [VisualShaderNodeTexture3D](class_visualshadernodetexture3d.md)

A base node for nodes which samples 3D textures in the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A virtual class, use the descendants instead.
